comment:
* An implementation of {@link java.io.OutputStream} that buffers entire request
 * body in memory. This is used when neither
 * {@link CronetHttpURLConnection#setFixedLengthStreamingMode}
 * nor {@link CronetHttpURLConnection#setChunkedStreamingMode} is set.

variables.name: mInitialContentLength
variables.comment: If content length is not passed in the constructor, this is -1.

variables.name: mBuffer
variables.comment: Internal buffer that is used to buffer the request body.

methods.name: public void write(int oneByte) throws IOException
public void write(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count) throws IOException
private void ensureCanWrite(int count) throws IOException
methods.comment: Ensures that {@code count} bytes can be written to the internal buffer.

methodNames: public void write(int oneByte) throws IOException
public void write(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count) throws IOException
private void ensureCanWrite(int count) throws IOException
